name: Neeraj Parekh
bio: I am an aspiring Electronics and Telecommunication Engineer from Pune. I have a passion for designing and implementing innovative and efficient solutions in the tech and coding world. With experience in various engineering domains and a focus on telecommunication technologies, I am ready to tackle challenging projects.
values: Integrity, discipline, teamwork, continuous learning, and a passion for technology and innovation.

education: Bachelor of Engineering (ENTC), MITAOE, Pune. Certifications: Python for Data Science, Embedded C for ESP32, MATLAB, AWS Cloud Practitioner.
